remarks: Left multiplication by a left regular element does not change the support set of a vector.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 20-Jul-2019.)
statement:
rrgval.e $e |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) $.
rrgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rrgval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
rrgsupp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
rrgsupp.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
rrgsupp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
rrgsupp.y $e |- ( ph -> Y : I --> B ) $.
rrgsupp $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I X. { X } ) oF .x. Y ) supp .0. ) = ( Y supp .0. ) ) $.
